# HillFood Project Setup Checklist

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- [x] Scaffold the Project - Create Vite + React + TypeScript project
- [x] Install Dependencies - Add TailwindCSS, React Router, Supabase, PWA plugin
- [x] Configure PWA - Set up manifest and service worker
- [x] Create Project Structure - Folders for components, pages, hooks, services, types
- [x] Configure Supabase - Set up client and environment variables
- [x] Create Initial Components - Layout, navigation, recipe components
- [x] Compile and Test - Verify project builds and runs

## Project Info
- **Name**: HillFood
- **Type**: Recipe database PWA
- **Stack**: React + TypeScript + Vite + Supabase + TailwindCSS
- **Features**: Recipe storage, sync between users, offline capability
